title.description: The title of the saved item, e.g., 'Face Analysis - 10/26/2023'

content.description: A summary or the main content of the saved item.

details.description: The full structured data of the analysis or recommendation.

source_page.description: Which page this item came from, e.g., 'Face', 'Diet', 'Exercise'.

icon.description: The name of the Lucide icon to represent this item.

user_email.description: The email of the user who saved the item.
